shortDescription: Remake of Portal (2007), a classic puzzle-platform game, for the Video Game Programming course at the University of Southern California.
resumeBullets: Programmed force-based first-person player movement, strafing, and axis-aligned bounding boxes (AABB) collision detection in 3D space.
Calculated portal positions, orientations, and teleportation logic using vectors, matrices, and quaternions.
Engineered sentry turret Artificial Intelligence controlled by a finite state machine to idle, search, prime, and fire at detected targets.
